item.title: PragerU's 'pro-American' Presidential Rankings Survey puts Washington first, Biden last
item.description: Presidential rankings tend to reward those on the left and penalize those on the right, which is where PragerU comes in.

item.title: Trump threatens Iran with more military action if it revives nuclear, missile programs
item.description: President Trump said Monday he would unleash "very powerful consequences" if Iran takes steps to restock its missile arsenal or rebuild its nuclear pr...

item.title: Rural health fund money to be rolled out in 2026
item.description: The Trump administration announced that all 50 states will receive award money from the $50 billion rural health fund that was passed in President Tru...

item.title: Trump to receive Israel Prize
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said President Trump will be receiving the Israel Prize, the highest honor awarded by the state of Israel.

item.title: Trump weighs 'gross incompetence' lawsuit against Fed Chair Jerome Powell
item.description: President Trump said Monday he is considering a lawsuit against Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell for "incompetence."
